title: Fix prediction data loading and expand stock search autocomplete coverage

requirements.text: Fix the prediction data retrieval logic to ensure predictions are properly loaded and displayed when users search for stocks. Verify that the backend query hooks successfully fetch prediction data from the actor and handle loading/error states appropriately.
acceptanceCriteria: Prediction data successfully loads for all stocks in the autocomplete list
Loading states display properly while fetching prediction data
Error messages are shown if prediction data fails to load
PredictionCard component renders with valid prediction data including movement direction, confidence level, and score

requirements.text: Expand the stock autocomplete list in useStockAutocomplete.ts to include a comprehensive list of NSE-traded stocks beyond the current 30 major stocks. Add at least 100+ commonly traded stocks covering different sectors to improve search coverage.

quotes: some stocks are not even getting in search option

acceptanceCriteria: Stock autocomplete includes at least 100 NSE-traded stocks across various sectors
Autocomplete filtering works correctly for both stock symbols and company names
Search results display properly ordered by relevance
Previously missing stocks are now available in search suggestions

requirements.text: Ensure backend data structures contain valid prediction data for all stocks in the expanded autocomplete list. Populate the predictions map with realistic sample data including prediction scores, confidence levels, timestamps, and contributing factors for each stock symbol.
acceptanceCriteria: Backend predictions map contains entries for all stocks in the autocomplete list
Each prediction includes valid prediction score (-100 to 100), confidence level (0-100), timestamp, and contributing factors
getPrediction query successfully returns data for any stock symbol from the autocomplete list
Historical prediction data is available for chart visualization

constraints: Do not change the single-actor backend architecture
Maintain existing data type definitions for StockPrediction and NewsArticle
Keep the existing authentication and query hooks structure intact
nonGoals: Implementing real-time data fetching from external APIs
Adding new prediction algorithms or sentiment analysis
Changing the visual design or layout of existing components
Modifying the routing structure or adding new pages
